videos.title: Elspeth, Storm Slayer  The ultimate token Commander
videos.description:
If you love tokens, you have to try this Brawl deck on MTG Arena. Elspeth is the queen of token decks.
Members Only Content - https://youtu.be/dRBiyJsaFG0

videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: Unified Battlefront in a crazy magic card
videos.description:
This deck features the new Tarkir: Dragonstorm rare Unified Battlefront in a Red / White Boros Tokens control list.

Check out list I played 100 games with to find the right version: https://youtu.be/cfBTnwiOIw8
